scriptsComments.dev: Starts the Sanity Studio in development mode
scriptsComments.start: Starts the Sanity Studio in production mode
scriptsComments.build: Builds the Sanity Studio for production
scriptsComments.deploy: Deploys the Sanity Studio to production
scriptsComments.deploy-graphql: Deploys the GraphQL API to production
scriptsComments.extract: Extracts the schema from the Sanity Studio
scriptsComments.gen: Generates the TypeScript types for the schema
